Title: ShotSpotter
Manager: Roth Capital Partners/ Northland Capital Markets
Business: We are the leader in gunshot detection solutions that help law enforcement officials and security personnel identify, locate and deter gun violence. We offer our software solutions on a SaaS-based subscription model to customers around the world with customers in the United States, Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands and South Africa. Our public safety solution, ShotSpotter Flex, is deployed in urban, high-crime areas to help deter gun violence by accurately detecting and locating gunshots and sending near real-time alerts to law enforcement.
